channel.title: Typer on tourpran
channel.description: Recent content in Typer on tourpran

item.title: expm1-35C3 - Bug/ Optimizations Analysis
item.description:
In this post, we’ll dive deep into a fascinating bug in the V8 JavaScript engine that arises from the mishandling of the Math.expm1(-0) function during the optimization process. We’ll break down how this edge case is misoptimized by V8’s Turbofan compiler, explore the root cause of the issue, and demonstrate how this leads to unexpected behavior.

For context, we’ll focus on the technical aspects surrounding the typer phase and its consequences for browser exploitation.
